John Taylor ma ọ bụ Johnny Taylor (b
Maachị 12, 1898) bụ onye ahịa Creole hiwere isi na Port Loko onye ụmụ nwoke agha Bai Bureh gburu n'oge Agha Tax Hut

Taylor bụ naanị Creole nke ụmụ nwoke agha Bai Bureh gburu ma ekwuru na ọnwu ya kpatara site na omume ya n'oge ọgba aghara ahụ.
Taylor nwere nwa nwanyị a na-akpọ Susan Taylor onye biri na Cline Town mgbe alụmdi na nwunye ya gasịrị
Taylor lụrụ Tabitha Mariah Taylor (nwa nwanyị catechist Charles S
Brown) na di na nwunye ahụ nwere nwa nwanyị a na-akpọ Mary Petan Taylor
Mary Taylor dị afọ ise mgbe e gburu nna ya na Port Loko
